meanings.definition: relating to or consisting of alloys of two or more metals
meanings.sent1: The intermetallic bond between the metals made the alloy strong.
meanings.sent2: The intermetallic properties of the metal mixture enhanced its durability.
meanings.sent3: The intermetallic combination created a shiny and tough material.
meanings.sent4: The intermetallic structure held the different metals together like a strong glue.
meanings.sent5: The intermetallic nature of the alloy made it perfect for industrial use.

meanings.definition: a compound formed by the combination of two or more metals
meanings.sent1: The intermetallic was a unique blend of various metals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the intermetallic to understand its properties.
meanings.sent3: The intermetallic in the lab sparkled like a treasure trove of metals.
meanings.sent4: The intermetallic resembled a colorful mosaic of different metals.
meanings.sent5: Miners discovered a rare intermetallic deep within the earth.
